oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nutrients and weeds through 13 years of organic farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Böhm, Herwart
Paulsen, Hans Marten
Fischer, Jenny
Moos, Jan Hendrik
Rahmann, Gerold
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Soil
Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The comparison of the cash crop and the dairy cow crop rotations showed some effects on yield, weeds and nutrients after 13 years of different management, but most of them are so far not statistically different.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Böhm, Herwart; Paulsen, Hans Marten; Fischer, Jenny; Moos, Jan Hendrik and Rahmann, Gerold (2014) Nutrients and weeds through 13 years of organic farming. [Næringsstoffer og ukrudt igennem 13 år med økologisk jordbrug.] In: Sammendrag af indlaeg Plantekongres 2014, pp. 294-297.
